However, they soon find themselves in the path of an enraged Godzilla as he cuts a swath of destruction across the globe. The initial confrontation between the two titans -- instigated by unseen forces -- is only the beginning of the mystery that lies deep within the core of the planet.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: An overweight, reclusive coed dies in a fraternity house fire, and Lilly discovers a photo of her being held down and forced to drink.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: Lilly and Jeffries reopen a case when the mother of a murdered boy finds a letter suggesting that his death was not a random act of violence.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: During the reinvestigation of a ballplayer found bludgeoned to death in 1945, Lilly and Jeffries run out of leads and must retrace their steps if they hope to collar the killer.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Prue and Phoebe lie on the stand during a murder trial, setting a killer free and endangering the life of an assistant district attorney.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: The sisters try to unite two young lovers kept apart by a sorcerer's curse; a defiant Piper secretly plans her wedding to Leo.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: To save a girl's life, Prue and Phoebe return to an earlier time when they innocently believed in fairies and trolls; Piper goes on strike.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: The sisters travel back in time to help a coven of witches in colonial Virginia and protect their own futures.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Prue, Phoebe and Piper become obsessed with learning more about the evil force that is hunting them after the manor is burglarized.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: When a spell backfires, Prue takes on all of the pain in the world and is flattened by the overwhelming flood of human emotion.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Cole uses petty anger between Prue, Phoebe and Piper to break their sisterly bond and smash the bedrock of their powers.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: After Cole's true identity is revealed, Phoebe must decide between following her heart or defying her sisters.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: When a she-demon takes possession of Piper before her 10-year high-school reunion, it is up to Prue and Phoebe to save their unsightly sister.

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: With the imminent destruction of Krypton, their home planet, Jor-El (Russell Crowe) and his wife seek to preserve their race by sending their infant son to Earth. The child's spacecraft lands at the farm of Jonathan (Kevin Costner) and Martha (Diane Lane) Kent, who name him Clark and raise him as their own son. Though his extraordinary abilities have led to the adult Clark (Henry Cavill) living on the fringe of society, he finds he must become a hero to save those he loves from a dire threat.

programme.title: Rampage
programme.desc: Primatologist Davis Okoye shares an unshakable bond with George, an extraordinarily intelligent, silverback gorilla that's been in his care since birth. When a rogue genetic experiment goes wrong, it causes George, a wolf and a reptile to grow to a monstrous size. As the mutated beasts embark on a path of destruction, Okoye teams up with a discredited genetic engineer and the military to secure an antidote and prevent a global catastrophe.

programme.title: Under An Olive Tree
programme.desc: The filmmaker sheds light on the story of Turkish-American activist Aysenur Ezgi Eygi, who was killed by an Israeli sniper while protesting for the rights of Palestinians.
